Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class ROM

java.lang.Object
eu.tivian.hardware.Memory
eu.tivian.hardware.ROM
public class ROM
extends Memory
ROM chip, based on CSG23128 used in C16.
Since:
2019-11-06
See Also:
Memory, CSG23128 datasheet

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    List<Pin> cs
    This ROM chip has three chip select pins.

    Fields inherited from class eu.tivian.hardware.Memory

    address, content, data, name

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void enable()

    Preloads from file contents of the chip.

    Returns the name of the chip.

  • Field Details

    • cs

      public final List<Pin> cs
      This ROM chip has three chip select pins.
      CS1 and CS2 are inverted, CS3 isn't.

  • Constructor Details

    • ROM

      public ROM​(int size)
      Initializes the chip with default name.
      Parameters:
      size - size of the memory array

    • ROM

      public ROM​(String name, int size)
      Initializes the chip with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the chip
      size - size of the memory array

  • Method Details

    • preload

      public void preload​(byte[] content)
      Preloads the contents of the chip.
      Parameters:
      content - data which should be loaded onto the chip

    • preload

      public void preload​(Path file) throws IOException
      Preloads from file contents of the chip.
      Parameters:
      file - the path to the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs reading from the file

    • enable

      private void enable()
      Enables the chip if the LOW level is at CS1 and CS2, and HIGH level on CS3 pins.
      Otherwise the data bus is changed to HI-Z state.

    • update

      private void update()
      Updates data bus according to the value on address bus if chip was enabled.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the name of the chip.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the name of the chip.
